home.sliderTitulo3: There is also a place for you, little one!
home.sliderDesc1: He will never be alone again! Just look for the service you need for the days you want.
home.sliderDesc2: Search our community for the most qualified users to give your pet the care it needs.
home.sliderDesc3: Peludets! It is not just for cats or dogs. We have room for all kinds of pets.
home.cardBox1: Find a place where your pet is comfortable while you enjoy your vacation!
home.cardBox2: It's not just for cats and dogs only. Our community can take care of any type of pet.
home.cardBox3: You can ask for how many walks and how long they are needed.
home.cardBox4: We have a professional section for exotic pets with special care.

explorador.bannerInfoTexto1: Here you will find places of interest such as shops, parks, vets and much more.
explorador.bannerInfoTexto2: Also if you are one of our affiliates you can find jobs in your area here!
explorador.tituloExplorador: Wait while we look for you ...

profesionales.bannerInfoTexto1: Here you will find people with all kinds of services for you and your pets!
